about_the_game:
📫 Letter Bunny is a cozy adventure game about mail 📫
You play as Anne, a small bunny tasked with delivering mail on a big island.
Discover the story of the many inhabitants, get to know them through the many letters, and help them out in their daily shenanigans.


🐦The local postbirds are understaffed! 🐦
After a big storm hit the island many letters and packages have been lost. Help deliver the numerous parcels to the right recipient while exploring the island and making new friends.

What are you waiting for? Wear the uniform, grab the backpack and you're off on delivery!



✉️ Get a glimpse into the life of the many residents with every letter ✉️
Help them out through their daily troubles. Give them a hand or lend them an ear and they might become your friends. Take your time talking with everyone, everyone has something to say or a story to share!


🐰Hop into a new adventure!🐰
There is a whole island to explore and many letters to be delivered. Find clever ways to get the job done
🎒 Use the different gadgets at your disposal to ease your journey!
☂️ Have fun gliding and sliding from one parcel to the next one. Don't forget to check for secrets while you get there!
🗺️ Never get lost with your trusty map! You'll always know where to go.




✨Get distracted by the many things to do! ✨
🐟 Want to go fishing? No problem! Grab your trusty fishing pole and give a high-five to every local fish!
🐞 Do you prefer bug catching? We've got you covered! Do a little dance to befriend the colorful critters!
📦 Someone lost a package? Better find who's the recipient! It might be something important!
🛷 Want to prove that you're the fastest sled racer on the island? Don't worry, you'll find the right challenge for you!



If you've read all the way here... you're awesome! 😉

name: Letter Bunny
short_description: Take on a cozy adventure as Anne, a small and determined bunny with a heart of gold. Explore the peaceful island, deliver many packages and discover that behind every letter is a unique story! Make new friends, help people out and most importantly, have fun!
